result.title: Spinach and Feta Turkey Burgers
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Mix together turkey, spinach, feta, eggs, and garlic in a large bowl until well combined; form into 8 patties.

Cook patties on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center, 15 to 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of patties should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
